GeneDef.label: inner peace
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have achieved a certain mental peace where they don't really care much about slights from others.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Immune to negative moods and opinions from social fights or insults.

GeneDef.label: rowdy
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene love to play fight. This might of course not be shared by the other person involved!

customEffectDescriptions.li: This gene will also make its carrier receive recreation after a social fight.

GeneDef.label: enforcer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are naturally adept at controlling people getting out of line, and therefore have a better chance of arresting them.

customEffectDescriptions.li: No metabolism cost because its effect is pretty minor. "But then I can add it to any xenotypes I make for free!". Yes, yes you can. Is that funny for you, or are you just bitching because you are a boring dumbass? Gods, I hate you so much, Mr. Strawman...

GeneDef.label: arrest avoidant
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are naturally inept at controlling people getting out of line, and therefore have a much worse chance of arresting them.

GeneDef.label: tough sinews
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can naturally use Heavy weapons or Warcasket weapons without the need of assisting armor.
